# AI Agents for Document Workflows
Leverage AI to extract data from PDFs, CSVs, images, and emails instantly. Automate manual workflows and supercharge your business efficiency.
[Book a Demo](https://tableflow.com/</demo>)
## Trusted by Industry Leaders
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66e0e119e38a72bab7016498_Takeapp%20logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/671686bb8c19cc47bf580aba_partbot-logo%20\(1\)%2012.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66e0e11e849008d9f4b34ea4_resend%20logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66ec70845191991d8c25816f_homebot-gray.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66e0e144db40afa668f8fc5e_channelmix%20logo.png)
Process
## How it Works
TableFlow accurately and efficiently extracts data from unstructured sources using a multi-stage process.
### Collect
Documents are collected via email, API, SFTP, or integration
### Extract
Text, numbers, and tables are extracted from the document with context
### Classify
Data is classified into pre-defined fields using human-like logic
### Validate
Data is validated and transformed to meet the destination requirements
### Complete
Clean, validated data is delivered via API, SFTP, or direct integration
INDUSTRIES
## AI-Driven Automation for Every Industry
Leading companies across industries are cutting manual processes with AI-powered data extraction. Learn how you can streamline your operations.
Distribution & Wholesale
Leading distributors and wholesalers are transforming their operations with AI-powered data extraction. From invoices to sales orders, complex documents are processed automatically, reducing over 95% of manual effort and accelerating data entry into their ERP systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66ec7868571b431548b3636c_steel-4395773_1280.jpg)
Supply Chain & Logistics
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66ec78fe989b6a7acf69724a_container-6799046_1280.jpg)
AI is reshaping supply chain and logistics by automating document-heavy processes. By extracting data from purchase orders, shipping manifests, and inventory reports, leading companies have cut down on manual workflows, gaining speed and accuracy in data processing.
Real Estate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66ec793403132b06b01edd51_house-1867187_1280.jpg)
AI is transforming real estate by automating data extraction from contracts, deeds, mortgage documents, and more. Top firms are cutting manual processes, enabling faster decision-making and improving the overall client experience.
Security
## Secure your data with our cloud platform.
Protect your data with a platform that meets global security and privacy standards. Ensure your business stays secure and compliant at every step.
![SOC 2 Badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66e234fe313454b28dd55c04_AICPA_SOC.png)
### SOC 2 Type 2
Our platform meets SOC 2 Type 2 compliance standards, ensuring that your data is handled with the highest levels of security, availability, and confidentiality. We provide end-to-end protection to maintain trust and integrity in every transaction.
![GDPR Badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/66e234fe223e4b8fd0533505_GDPR.png)
### GDPR
We adhere to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) to ensure the highest standards of data privacy for users worldwide. Rest assured, your data is protected under strict international regulations, safeguarding your business from data breaches.
## Data-Driven Transformation at Scale
TableFlow has processed tens of thousands of documents and extracted billions of data points, helping businesses across industries automate manual workflows and unlock new efficiencies.
### 20K+
Documents Processed
### 1B+
Data Points Extracted
### >99%
Touchless Completion
### <10s
Completion Time
### Smart Data Capture
Eliminate manual data entry and reduce human error with automated, intelligent data capture.
### Customizable Workflows
Create and automate workflows that adapt to your evolving operational requirements, from simple tasks to complex processes.
### Real-Time Processing
Speed up decision-making and gain real-time insights with continuous data updates and automation.
### Scalable Infrastructure
Handle increasing document volumes while maintaining high performance and reliability, no matter your size or sector.
DEMO
## Book your Demo, and Unlock 10x Productivity
[Book a Demo](https://tableflow.com/</demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e02681115bc07ca019fd66/671179475467b5b986f39b46_Main%20logo%20_%20TableFlow-white.svg)](https://tableflow.com/<http:/tableflow.com>)

generated_description:
### TableFlow Overview

**Company Name:** TableFlow  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Website:** [tableflow.com](https://tableflow.com)  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Group Partner:** Brad Flora  

#### Mission
TableFlow aims to revolutionize document workflows by leveraging AI agents that automate the extraction of data from various formats—like PDFs, CSVs, images, and emails—instantly. Their focus centers around increasing efficiency and reducing manual efforts in document handling.

#### How It Works
TableFlow's process is robust and meticulous, entailing the following steps:

1. **Collect:** Gather documents via email, API, SFTP, or integration.
2. **Extract:** Pull text, numbers, and tables from documents while preserving context.
3. **Classify:** Use human-like logic to categorize data into defined fields.
4. **Validate:** Ensure data accuracy and transform it to meet specific requirements.
5. **Complete:** Deliver validated data via preferred methods like API or direct integration.

This multi-stage process has proven effective, with TableFlow processing over 20,000 documents and extracting more than a billion data points, achieving a touchless completion rate exceeding 99%.

#### Industries Served
TableFlow’s technology benefits a variety of sectors:
- **Distribution & Wholesale:** Automates the processing of invoices and sales orders, drastically cutting manual effort.
- **Supply Chain & Logistics:** Streamlines data extraction from purchase orders and shipping manifests to enhance accuracy and speed.
- **Real Estate:** Guarantees faster decision-making through automated processing of contracts and mortgage documents.

#### Security
Data protection is a priority; TableFlow complies with stringent standards:
- **SOC 2 Type 2:** Ensures high security, availability, and confidentiality of data.
- **GDPR Compliance:** Guarantees data privacy for users across the globe, reassured by strict international regulations.

#### Value Proposition
With TableFlow, businesses unlock significant productivity gains. They offer:
- **Smart Data Capture:** Minimizes manual entry and reduces errors.
- **Customizable Workflows:** Adapts to changing operational requirements with ease.
- **Real-Time Processing:** Accelerates insights and decision-making through continuous data access.
- **Scalable Infrastructure:** Maintains reliability across varied document volumes and business sizes.

### Call to Action
For organizations looking to enhance their operational efficiency through document automation, TableFlow invites you to [Book a Demo](https://tableflow.com/</demo>) and experience a tenfold increase in productivity. 

In a nutshell, TableFlow is not just about data extraction; it's about transforming how businesses handle their documentation for a more efficient, error-free future.
